settings.content: Unlock tax-exempt pricing and special offers, and save more as you spend more. Plus, get early access to exclusive product releases, events, and milestone-marking gifts. You can even apply to have your work featured on our Floof Design page!

Connect with your highly experienced Floof consultant whenever, wherever — and receive curated swatches tailored to your aesthetic, detailed product tear sheets, and trade resources like trend and best sellers reports.
Place project orders now, and get them delivered when you need them. And because we understand that installs and project planning take time, we always offer extended returns.

settings.title: Join the Floof Family
settings.text: Help us make the world a softer place, one delightfully overstuffed pillow at a time. Get in on the pillow-making magic and join our team of friendly Floof folks!

settings.content: Enjoy PTO for full-time employees, plus paid holidays.
Serious discounts on all Floof products.
Choose from a broad range of medical, dental, vision, and life insurance plans.
Full-time employees receive a complimentary pair of Floof pillows.
Leave two hours early every other Friday during the summer to soak up the sun!
Free coffee and snacks are provided.

The successful candidate should be a highly motivated, high-energy individual with a strong desire to succeed and mentor our Service team while focusing on excellent customer service and adhering to our policies and procedures. The Customer Concierge Manager is responsible for maintaining high customer retention, customer satisfaction, and monitoring customer complaints as well as contacting service customers after they visit to monitor quality control and satisfaction.

settings.title: Floof up your inbox with styling secrets, new collection alerts, and beyond
Does Floof have seasonal sales?
settings.answer: Our main goal is to offer style and value of the highest caliber in the industry all year long. For this reason, we do not put on seasonal sales or promotions — which means you can always get the best possible price whenever you're in a pillow-buying mood!

settings.title: How will my order be packed?
settings.answer: Your pillows will be carefully packed in a Floof dust cover and box that's specifically designed to deliver every product in pristine condition.

settings.title: How do I clean and care for my pillow covers?
settings.answer: For more information about caring for your pillows, visit our pillow care guide here.

settings.title: Can I wash my inserts?
settings.answer: Yes. We recommend washing your inserts once a year. Take a look at our pillow care guide for more information on how to properly wash your inserts.

settings.title: Who is the Floof team?
settings.answer: We’re thrilled you want to know the faces behind Floof! We are a family with decades of home décor design and manufacturing experience. We have a passion for design, architecture, art, and all things luxury. Floof is our way of introducing to the world a seamless throw pillow shopping experience for design experts and novices alike. For more information about who we are and our mission, take a peek at Our Quality page.

settings.title: What makes your pillow special?
settings.answer: It’s not just a pillow, it’s Floof. We take special pride in knowing the level of excitement our customers get when they receive our pillows. From our luxurious fabrics to the comfiest inserts, we take our craftsmanship seriously. Check out Our Quality page to read more about the Floof difference.

settings.title: What does it mean that your fill is RDS certified?
settings.answer: All of our down is sourced according to strict Responsible Down Standards, geared toward creating a more humane and sustainable supply chain for feather down. The animals we get our down from are never subjected to harmful practices like force-feeding or live-plucking, and we’re even able to track our down back to whatever farm it came from. This means more transparency and trustworthy standards that make for a kinder, more compassionate approach to down sourcing. Learn more about RDS here.

settings.title: What exactly is Performance fabric?
settings.answer: Its superpowers are all in the name. This textile is a high-performing fabric that repels spills and cleans easily with soap and water; resists abrasion and pilling (aka regular wear and tear), and stands up to pets and kids. We partner with the world’s leading textile mills to create our Performance fabric, using innovative technologies that give it next-level durability and resistance to stains and odors.

settings.title: Can your products be used in a commercial setting?
settings.answer: Yes, Floof is all about being ahead-of-the-curve in design and offering timeless pieces. Stay in the know by creating an account and becoming a Floofer to receive the latest Floofisms!

settings.title: How can I get in touch with your press team?
settings.answer: Thank you for considering us for press opportunities, we're flattered. To get in touch with our press team, please email press@floofliving.com.

settings.title: I am interested in partnering with Floof, who can I contact?
settings.answer: We are always looking for new collabs and partnerships. To get in touch with our marketing and creative team, please send an email to press@floofliving.com.

settings.title: How can I join the Floof with Benefits trade program?
settings.answer: Our trade program is tailored toward designers, stagers, retailers, and other design professionals. In order to qualify for Floof with Benefits, you must apply on our trade program page and verify your business by submitting the necessary credentials.

settings.title: How can I check on the status of my order?
settings.answer: If you're curious where your order is in the process, check your inbox for order update emails, log in to your account here, or just shoot us an email at concierge@floofliving.com.

settings.title: How will I know that you received my order?
settings.answer: Once items have been ordered, a confirmation page will show a summary of your transaction. You may choose to print this for your records. An email version of this summary will be sent promptly, provided that we have an accurate email address. We'll send subsequent email(s) when your product ships, including tracking information.

settings.title: Can I return or exchange an item?
settings.answer: We stand by with a 100% satisfaction guarantee within the first 14 days of delivery. If you're not in love with your pillows, just follow the steps here for a hassle-free return. If you would like to exchange your pillows, you can also do so on the link above.

settings.title: How do I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer: If you’d like to make any changes to your recently placed order, send us an email at concierge@floofliving.com as soon as possible. We commence the manufacturing process of your Floof pillows quickly, so sooner is better. Order changes or cancellations are subject to a potential $15 fee if made after things get in motion with our factory.

settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: Our standard shipping rate is $12. We offer complimentary shipping for orders of 2 pillows or more.

settings.title: When will my order ship and how long does it take?
settings.answer: All Floof pillows are handmade in our California atelier where we focus on craftsmanship and quality. Pillows should ship out within 4-6 business days from placing your order.

settings.title: Do you offer expedited shipping?
settings.answer: No, all of our products ship via FedEx ground where normal transit times are 3-5 business days.

settings.title: Do you ship outside the United States?
settings.answer: Currently, we do not ship outside the United States.

settings.title: Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
settings.answer: Our carrier is currently unable to deliver to P.O. box addresses.

settings.text_first: Do you have any questions or just want to say hello? Drop us a line at
For partnership or retail opportunities, please reach out to
For press inquiries, please reach out to

settings.text: By creating an account, I accept the Privacy Policy.

settings.title: Sharing our eye for design
settings.text: Inspired by art, travel, and culture, our pillow-crazy team draws on interior design and couture runway trends from the chicest corners of the world. Generations of design experience — not to mention more than a few aha moments — inform every Floofism, every ahead-of-the-curve trend, and every timeless look we weave into our pillows.

settings.title: Exceptional fabrics from around the world
settings.text:
Trusted sourcing partners We only work with suppliers whose entire process meets our standards — from yarn selection to dyeing to weaving.

Specialized mills We source from select mills with distinct textile specialties, like rich Middle Eastern velvets and fine-woven European linen.

Tested for durability We personally touch and test every fabric before using it, choosing highly durable, contract grade fabrics that last forever and prevent rogue feathers from poking through.

settings.title:
Overstuffed with
all-natural wild feathers and ethical down
settings.text:
Cruelty-free down Sourced according to the Responsible Down Standard, our down can be traced back to the exact farm it came from, which means a more transparent supply chain and humane practices you can trust.

Vegan fill that hugs you back Stuffed with hypoallergenic “feathers,” our vegan fill is fluffy, not lumpy, and just as comfy as the real thing.

settings.title: Hand-sewn in our California studio
settings.text:
Rigorous quality control Dedicated makers oversee every step of the pillow-making process — from cleaning to stitching to reinforcing hems for the utmost ravel-resistance.

Construction that never cuts corners We put in more hours and materials to make intricate patterns, invisible zippers, and small details that make a big difference.

A joyful pillow place We proudly create a supportive work environment, because happy people make happy pillows.

settings.title: Floof runs in the family
settings.text: Floof is the newest creation from the Sivas family, the great minds behind D.V. KAP, the go-to pillow supplier for the world’s top interior designers. After decades of pillow making, we’re on a mission to make sure everyone can recognize–and own!–superior quality pillows.

settings.title: Join the Pillow Party
settings.content: Be one of our VIPs when we launch.

settings.title:
PIllows Crafted
In Luxury
settings.text:
Handcrafted pillows straight from
our atelier to your home

settings.text-1: I was impressed—these are not cheapo pillows, I was pleasantly surprised by how lush everything felt!
settings.text-2: The on-trend pillow collections from Floof make the process seamless.
settings.text-3: Floof is the luxury pillow brand that will breathe life into your living room and be the center of attention.
